Description: St Anthony/ St Jerome; printed from two blocks on one sheet; whole-length figures standing on pedestals, St Anthony facing left, St Jerome to right; Anthony holding a tau cross to which a bell is attached; Jerome in cardinal's garb, with a staff surmounted by a cross and holding the lion's paw. Illustrations to 'Vortzeichnis und zceigung des hochlobwirdigen heiligthumbs der Stiftskirchen ... zu Halle, Halle 1520. Woodcut
Curator's comments: St Anthony not illustrated in the facsimile edition of the 'Hallisches Heiligthumsbuch', St Jerome, no.46 of this edition. See also Curatorial Comment for 1952,0405.240.
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
